title: Bug 11314: Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
OB: In the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), when I enter 'com.ibm.foobar' and apply package name compression, it is replaced with 'co~.ib~.foobar'. However, I believe that the package name compression should only replace a fragment if the compressed name is actually smaller. In this example, 'com.' should not be replaced since 'co~.' is the same length and contains less information.
